item.title: Work-life balance
item.description: The past year has been a very agitated year in my career. Looking back at all the things that went or still going on, I want to take a stop and ask to myself, what am I doing? And most importantly, where am I going ? I made many mistakes, but the biggest one being that I have thought about everything but myself. Looking back Two years ago I started managing a team to work on complicated projects involving cross collaboration with other companies.
